description:
Made up by me because there`s nothing on the website: A plea from a famous ballet troupe brings the extractors to the divided Ikebukuro Cluster. But will even they be able to sneak 18 clients past a lethal train crossing with secret police breathing down their necks?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: You Can`t Run from the Aquarium
水族館から逃げられない
